helloldap.exc¶

Exceptions.

exception helloldap.exc.AuthenticationFailedError[source]¶

Bases: helloldap.exc.HelloLDAPError

Raised when username/password could not be authenticated.

exception helloldap.exc.HelloLDAPError[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Base exception of this app.

exception helloldap.exc.MissingJwtError[source]¶

Bases: helloldap.exc.HelloLDAPError

Raised when JWT was not present in request headers.
